  • Constructor Details

    • Match

      public Match(Fighter fighter1, Fighter fighter2, String prefix)
      Constructs a Match object with two fighters and a match ID prefix. The match ID is generated by appending a unique identifier to the prefix.
      Parameters:
      fighter1 - the first fighter in the match
      fighter2 - the second fighter in the match
      prefix - the prefix for the match ID

    • Match

      public Match(String matchId, Fighter fighter1, Fighter fighter2)
      Constructs a Match object with a specific match ID and two fighters.
      Parameters:
      matchId - the match ID
      fighter1 - the first fighter in the match
      fighter2 - the second fighter in the match

    • Match

      public Match(String prefix)
      Constructs a Match object with a match ID prefix. The match ID is generated by appending a unique identifier to the prefix.
      Parameters:
      prefix - the prefix for the match ID
